comment: Is a part-time professor, is very knowledgeable and knows the job, but is terrible at teaching and breaking it down. MATLAB is a Freshman class, but he uses and teaches Junior/Senior level problems without showing how to do the MATLAB separate from the classes none have seen; is not clear on how he grades or what is asked for in questions.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY
